name: Brain rot
description:
Made in 3 days for NYU Game Center's Major Studio Fall Class in 2020.
This week's prompt was to use the assets given to create a game. All assets except for the music in this game were given by the professor. The music is from Brockhampton's song FABRIC.

To play, use the left click to stop words from rotting the brain and right click to try and make a binary shield around the brain. Be careful though, the shield goes down very quickly and loads back up slowly.

Now you may be wondering what the heck this game even is :) And to that all I have to say is...brain rot lol.
